ComicInfo.Title: Initiation; Beaver Shot; The Ups And Downs Of Anthropomorphic Relationships, Part 3: The Last Chapter; As Advertised In The Post; Pencil Test
ComicInfo.Summary:
Initiation: Mae's initiation into the King-Size Club is to make love to a succession of males with increasingly large penises.
Beaver Shot: Officer Dennis has an extreme solution for Maurie's thick pubic hair.
The Ups And Downs Of Anthropomorphic Relationships, Part 3: The Last Chapter: Desiree conducts another lecture on inter-species sex, with poor Tom again demonstrating.
As Advertised In The Post: An elderly customer stops by Piggy's shopping for a different kind of Rubbermaid product.
Pencil Test: A disagreement between Misty and her friend Larna evolves into a competition to see who can hold the heaviest object between her huge breasts.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:32. [Issue ID 248476]
